channel.title: New Runescape Random Event/Item Drops Updated?
channel.description: Hey, I Dont Know If Anyone Else Has Noticed, but runescape have seemed to have linked runescape random events/tree nest drops etc. to levels, rather than "RANDOM", anyone else noticed this?? ;D

item.title: New Runescape Random Event/Item Drops Updated?
item.dc:creator: @warouxriot warouxriot
item.description:
@warouxriot wrote:

ahhh, must be coincidence thenn i suppose…

Read full topic
item.source: New Runescape Random Event/Item Drops Updated?

item.title: New Runescape Random Event/Item Drops Updated?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“warouxriot, post:3, topic:364902”]Nahh,
Like when you woodcut, you seem to get nest drops, straight after leveling up, and my brother also plays runescape, and we’ve got random events at the same levels, on neally the same exp, which makes me think, have they linked the randoms, to leveling, rather than random[/quote]maybe it was coincidence. i dont think so though because on 2 different accounts i got to 50+ woodcutting on the same day and don’t recall getting a single nest

Read full topic
